mapper.select: select * from ashare_list order by id limit 300
mapper.insert: insert into ashare_history ( code, alias, date, open, close, high, low, volume, psy_type, psy, psyma, create_time)values ( #{code}, #{alias}, #{date}, #{open}, #{close}, #{high}, #{low}, #{volume}, #{psy_type}, #{psy}, #{psyma}, SYSDATE() )
